name: Arken World
description: Arken World is a blockchain-based strategy game that combines idle mechanics with world-building and community-driven events. Players construct and upgrade buildings, generate resources, and expand their influence within a persistent digital city. The ecosystem is powered by the $ARK token, which serves as the medium for upgrades, governance, and in-game activities. Arken World is designed as a long-term universe that evolves with new content, faction conflicts, and lore-based activations, offering both gameplay utility and a foundation for broader integrations in the Solana ecosystem.
